snippet: Gov. Tom Wolf imposed a moratorium on the death penalty on Friday, calling the current system of capital punishment “anything but infallible.”
abstract: Pennsylvania Gov Tom Wolf decries state's capital punishment system and imposes moratorium until legislative committee reports on issue; critics say Wolf has no authority to take that action.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Tom Wolf imposed a moratorium on the death penalty on Friday, calling the current system of capital punishment “anything but infallible.”
